text: we were just sitting there you know
everybody was joking around and you know
how it is on Sundays all the kids
running around all over the place nobody
could see him nobody could see him but
we could sure feel the bullets coming in
there and fast started shooting more
going like walking back and forth
through the aisles and here and there
and he to him I think you thought maybe
he was in the military or something
I had already been hit and I was
crawling trying to hide more so he
wouldn't see me
oh god please everybody screaming please
stop this and please help me when he ran
away whoever was left I didn't even know
how many people were left in there I got
myself up and I walked outside because I
I knew it was over already I knew it was
over I don't know if I'll be able to go
back to that church I don't think I'm
ever gonna be able to go back it's just
gonna have so many bad memories for me
